summary: Adds a merchant who sells some questionable ingredients, such as human flesh and Daedra hearts.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/UJ12AJk.png[/img][/center]
[center][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65163/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/QtD7v94.png[/img][/url][/center]


This mod was a request, and I'm happy to help :) I placed a new merchant in an abandoned camp (part of the vanilla game) southwest of Northwatch Keep who sells some questionable ingredients, such as human flesh, human hearts, and Daedra hearts. You may know it as 'the camp with all those pieces of clam meat in a crate'. He sells items 24/7 and is essential so he doesn't get killed by horkers.

The outfit he wears in the pictures was randomized from Frostfall - he's just wearing a hooded robe in the vanilla game. Just so you know ;)

There's an optional version with some cosmetic changes; I renamed the map marker to "Seedy's Camp", gave him a dagger, added some idle markers, a chair, a knapsack and a copy of The Doors of Oblivion. Choose one or the other!

To install, place the files in your 'SteamSteamAppsCommonSkyrimData' folder. Then activate the mod through your preferred launcher by ticking the checkbox next to the esp. Let me know if there are any problems!


[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/UJ12AJk.png[/img][/center]
author: Jokerine
